about.title: B
about.descriptionTextOne: I'm a front-end developer who codes with personality, designs with purpose, and dreams in green.
about.descriptionTextTwo: I believe technology should be intuitive, impactful, and a force for good.
about.descriptionTextThree: Between lines of code, you'll find me flowing through yoga, surrounded by pets, or recharging by the sea.
